Html:
Hi, I would like to have another option in the map type options:

Install a local geoserver server (or other) and get titles from it in order to avoid Internet connection requirement...

Are there any samples in this purpose? 

Is it possible to do it? 

Any advices would be very appreciated.

Thanks

Alan
there is no samples, but some people did that

Hi Alan_Steve, did you manage to find some info regarding setting up own GEO server.

 

Thanks

Hi Alan_Steve

I have created a WMS provider that we use to retrieve maps from GeoServer.
See the topic: http://greatmaps.codeplex.com/discussions/278458
